name: Walk through Space
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: When under the effects of this spell, you can teleport up to 30 feet as a move action. You must end this movement in an unoccupied space that you can stand on within line of sight. Alternatively, you can spend a move action to teleport to a standing position from lying prone. Teleporting does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (一颗鹪鹩鸟的蛋)
text_zh:
持续时间 1轮/等级

当你身处该法术效果下，你可以以一个移动动作传送最多30尺远。

你必须在一个你视野内的未被占据的可站立的方格内结束这次移动。

此外，你还可以花费一个移动动作从倒地状态回复站立。

传送不会引发藉机攻击。
